roleset.name: break violently

example.name: both args
example.text: Why, when a key witness disappears, does Mancuso-3 trash her apartment, [*-3] tearing down drapes, smashing walls?

roleset.note: Member of VNcls break-45.1, carve-21.2-1, hit-18.1-1 throw-17.1-1. Updated by Julia, 11/2010.

roleset.name: move violently, so as to break apart

example.name: crunch
example.text: The Boeing 727, en route to Honduras from Costa Rica via Nicaragua, smashed into the hills outside Tegucigalpa as it approached the capital's airport in high winds and low clouds.
example.arg: The Boeing 727, en route to Honduras from Costa Rica via Nicaragua,
as it approached the capital's airport in high winds and low clouds

roleset.note: Member of VNcls bump-18.4-1. Updated by Julia, 11/2010.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'smash' based on sentences in wsj.

roleset.name: smash_up: break completely
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.

example.name: Both args
example.text: Any sympathy the general public had for the man whose death supposedly spurred on this onslaught of violence is surely being eroded by the minute when-4 thugs are smashing up the businesses , cars and homes of innocent people who had NOTHING TO DO WITH IT T*-4.
example.arg: the businesses, cars and homes of innocent people who had NOTHING TO DO WITH IT
